description.markdown: Kicking off our Q2 events for 2025! Join London.js for an evening of JavaScript talks, networking, and refreshments!

speaker.name: Sam Larsen-Disney
speaker.role: Founder @ HackathonParty & Senior Design Engineer @ Clarify

talks.title: From Chaos to Clicks: What HackathonParty taught us about productionising a side project
Search Unchained: How Checkatrade Replaced Elasticsearch with a Custom, AI-Ready Stack

organizers.name: James McLeod
organizers.role: Open Source Program Lead, NatWest Group

refreshments.description: A variety of food & drink will be served. We will endeavour to cater for allergies & dietary requirements. This won't just be pizza & beer either...

items: A desire to explore JavaScript from different points of view is absolutely recommended
Feel free to bring your JS projects along
Please RSVP to secure a place
Please ask plus 1's to sign up to the group & RSVP
Spaces are limited so techies get priority
